price: 59.Markuu u diyaariyey rarkoodii raashinka, wuxuu yidhi: Ii keena walaal aad leedihiin oo xagga aabbihiin ah. Miyeydaan arkayn inaan bixiyo beeg dhan, iyo inaan Anigu u wanaagsnahay inta wax marti gelisa?
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمۡ قَالَ ٱئۡتُونِي بِأَخٖ لَّكُم مِّنۡ أَبِيكُمۡۚ أَلَا تَرَوۡنَ أَنِّيٓ أُوفِي ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَأَنَا۠ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim qāla i'tūnī bi-akhin lakum min abīkum alā tarawna annī ūfī al-kayla wa-anā khayru al-munzilīna
